name: Space-Couch: Survivor
description:
Fly around your home planet on your trusty sofa chair and blast away at the endless UFO attackers! This is a simple arcade shooter game where every bullet shot flies around the planet, and you must target your attackers just right whilst dodging their circling bullets. This was created in under a week by myself as a little test to improve my ability to actually finish my projects :D.

Move with the arrow keys and shoot with LMB. Or if using a gamepad, A is to shoot. Thanks for checking out my game!
